administrator_settings.title: Full settings for the extension
administrator_settings.description: Either a full path to a file generated with the 'Save to file' button in the extension's Options or else the content of that file (which is a JSON string).

when_to_load.title: When to load the administrator settings
when_to_load.description: Zero or more of the following words (space-separated): install, startup, policyChange. That is, load at install time and/or at browser start-up and/or when 'administrator_settings' changes.
